Review.Titre: Signed up for trial in the fall of 2022
Review.Contenu: Signed up for trial in the fall of 2022.Realized that it was something I was not going to use and went through he cancellation process back in Sept/Oct. Was assured that it was canceled only to find that they are still charging me $29 per month. Pure ripoff

Review.Titre: A three months FREE trial was promoted…
Review.Contenu: A three months FREE trial was promoted on their website. As soon as I entered my PayPal information, 89.99 USD was billed from my account!I want a refund and this has not happened yet!They have also promoted a 30 day money-back guarantee, which I could also not make use of yet because of their slow customer service!Do not purchase a subscription on their website!!!Edit: After a lot of back and forth and questionable statements by the service (for example, that no 30 day money-back guarantee was ever given… which is FALSE!), my money was finally refunded. I still wouldn’t recommend this company!

Review.Titre: in the webviews there are sooo many…
Review.Contenu: in the webviews there are sooo many useless previews of multipart files individual dummies shown and yenc deosnt preview at all. this is subhuman and you know that this is subhuman. enjoy satisfacting your customers :)problem appears in the view group daily readout. nothing todo with search options.

Review.Titre: I had around 3/4k GB of data in Oct/Nov…
Review.Contenu: I had around 3/4k GB of data in Oct/Nov - It disappeared overnight. No idea what happened and it is really difficult to contact customer services via the website.Now I am re-building the data allowance and to be frank am thinking of cancelling the service.

Review.Titre: Rubbish company to try and deal with
Review.Contenu: Rubbish company to try and deal with. Signed up for an account but never got any login details.Took my money though! Case open with PayPal to get my money back.
Most downloads don’t work or are extremely slow.  Used to be the best many years ago.

Review.Titre: Three months of EasyNews bills, no month of service
Review.Contenu: I joined up with EasyNews, after many years not being on Usenet, on a plan that was somewhere around $15 a month. I get a monthly bill for about twice that, but, thus far, no service at all. I've tried to contact them for set-up help––my former newsreader is now defunct––and had no luck. Plainly, Easynews is only interested in siphoning of our money and takes no pride in providing Usenet service.

Do not go anywhere near this company if you expect any level of service. Probably the worst company I have dealt with. Support zero to useless, getting a response r0to cancel service is impossible. After waiting a week for them to resolve the issue I am still no neared a solution so will raise the renewal charge as a fraudulent transaction. They gave been given ample time to resolve. BEWARE !

Review.Titre: Three days and still awaiting a…
Review.Contenu: Three days and still awaiting a response. VPN stopped working without warning so contacted support regarding payment and VPN issue. Easynews customer service is now a joke and will look for another site. Received a new email from the VPN provider this morning out if the blue with a new password! No explanation and still nothing from Easynews. Avoid and go elsewhere.

Review.Titre: I have been a member more then 20 years…
Review.Contenu: I have been a member more then 20 years and when you switched over to HTTPS I have only 200 days retention! I have not been able to get in touch with you at all. I am going to stop my service with you  if this issue is not resolved.

Easynews customer service is virtually nonexistent. Their payment system is antiquated and in desperate need of updating.Your automated processing system fails while your manual payment system succeeds with the SAME payment data. Explain that. Explain why the only option you have offered me is to perform yet another manual payment.Your customer service associates have NOT responded to my request to determine why the payment failed. They are not responding to my email and you to not offer phone service to resolve customer service issues.

I replaced my credit card last year, and so received an email from EN saying my account was locked.  I clicked the link to update my payment info and after entering the data, noted that the page said my card was expired.  NOT TRUE.  I noticed that I could enter the month of expiration, but could not enter the year.  When I informed support about this they ignored my message and instead kept pumping me for information to verify my identity.  All they had to do was fix the page and I would have been a happy "customer".  Instead they gave me the bureaucratic grilling.  Not customer friendly at all.  When I refused to obediently go and sift through my old bank statements, they disappeared.

Review.Titre: Crap Service in the last couple of years
Review.Contenu: My credit card timed out and iI was cut off. I fixed that on line and they took my money and I am still locked out. NO PHONE SUPPORT NUMBER!!!!Half the posts are being pulled yet they claim they have a year retention. I am looking for a new usenet,,, any suggestions? Easynews does not care about their customers. I have been with them for 15 years, I will be leaving unless they step up their support and customer service.Peedee

I have been a member of Easynews for 13 years now. They used to have good customer service, but no longer. I've contacted them 7 or 8 times via email trying to get an account issue resolved (I can only access my account in Chrome, Firefox and IE are now throwing errors saying my account was closed, which it's not). They have not replied to any of my emails at all. They do not care about customers any longer. I am checking right now into new providers.

Very bad, I can't cancel the subscription. No contact, No phonenumber. My account still continues to be rebill, even if I want to stop. I've contacted my bank now and I hope I will get the refund, back as I haven't ordered this. Beware, scam company!

Review.Titre: Terrible, but probably better than most
Review.Contenu: Retention is spotty, transfer speeds vary wildly, support is the worst caricature of uncaring IT nerds who think everything it the user’s fault and treat you like an idiot.
Just like another poster here in this thread noted they offered no money until I posted the truth about them on the WWW and FB and Usenet. They offered a pittance of what they scammed from me.
post names have become meaningless (abc xyz), making searching and filtering impossible.  this isn't really your problem, but it makes your service useless.

Have to agree with the two post referring to poor service.  Have sent 10 or so emails to support over the past couple of years, none of which have been answered.  While those were obviously not too important, the current email is. Having recently been forced to close the funding account I was using to pay them, I have tried to use the system to change the cc number. It has failed each time. And while  I just now sent them an email, given the past history I am not expecting a reply. I also agree with the service just recently becoming so horrid. Having been a member for almost 25 years! I can attest to the fact it has not always been so. An example. Even in this forum they mask their email address. What is pr - at - easynews supposed to mean?

This is a scam. Sign up for a free 14 day trial, 3 or 4 days later they bomb bill you $89.99 without ANY warning. Then claim its YOUR problem in attempt to get it addressed. Don't fall for it. You'll end up having to  file a claim with your payment provider (PayPal or Credit Card).$90 for a 3 or 4 day trial, then blame the customer for your lack of business ethics?updated:12/11/20Easynews, I HAVE contacted you multiple times on this, you REFUSE to offer a refund. I have the communication saved and documented. You took the time to comment & virtue signal in public, this is dishonest & unethical to NOT mention your refusal to refund.In your OWN contract, you clearly state that service is AUTOMATICALLY stopped when limit has been reached, to give the customer a chance to decide to stop or re-up.

Review.Titre: when i first joined easy news years ago…
Review.Contenu: when i first joined easy news years ago i could make a playlist and burn a cd, cant seem to do that now. i would like some help but dont know where to look

Review.Titre: i paid can't get in what is my user…
Review.Contenu: i paid can't get in what is my user name what is my password i don't know i am not a mind reader what's wrong with you people

Review.Titre: Tried for three days to get customer…
Review.Contenu: Tried for three days to get customer support with out any joy. Never answer emails or respond .AVOID AT ALL COSTS.!!

I have an account that is supposed to be an "unlimited annual" and it ran out of gigs. I am now locked out. I have sent several emails and received no replies. I can't log in to the search and they are not replying. This happened some time ago and they came to life when I left a review here. Other than this bull-crap of not answering the service is at least average. Their support link on their main page goes to an error 404 page. I have been with these guys for 17 years and their support has always been poor as they used to have a phone line for support but they got rid of it. I have been without service on an UNLIMITED ANNUAL ACCOUNT for 5 days now and no replies to my emails. I will be cancelling with them and looking for another web based News server if I don't hear from them in the next 48 hours.I will also be contacting the better business bureau of Los Angeles.If they are having covid problems, the least they could do is post a notice on they login page. I am beginning to think the have flown the coup with all their customers money. "No contact" is very scary and usually means something shady is going on.
instead of resolving my re-subsrciption issues, I was sent a link and told to try that.

Review.Titre: It was useless subscription for me…
Review.Contenu: It was useless subscription for me personally. Waste of money.

Review.Titre: No response to complaint from Easynews

Review.Contenu: Paid for a year of Easynews and I get consistent buffer all the way through.   The more I looked into it I noticed there are only servers in the U.S and Europe.  I live in Australia and it's absolutely a bufferfest.  If you live in the Asia South Pacific be mindful you will not have a good time.Not necessarily Easynew's fault but I should have looked into it further before I had bought it

Review.Titre: Easy News is a very beautiful app

Review.Contenu: The service provided is accurately portrayed in the adverts.The interface and search are adequatehow to use usenet is and the environment of Newsnet lacking, what are par files and how to use.......?They require that they must retain all customer payment information to permit autopay, this makes them a major security risk to customers.  If there is a breach and they happen to notice, we must also then trust them to tell us.
1. Titles used to grey out after I downloaded them.  Not now.2. Clicking "Next Page" often brings me to the next date.
I've been a long time user.  I have enjoyed the service, however currently i have been unable to use this service.

Review.Titre: Since 28.10.2021 downloads stop or no download possible
Review.Contenu: Since 28.10.2021, I always get this error message for user Macloud with Newsbin:[10/30 16:54:58]  ERROR Downloader:  Command Exception NNTP Perform Auth - NEWS SERVER ERROR: EasyNews-Password: Username was rejected by GetDomain:480 EasyNewsWhat does this mean?I also get HTTP-Error 404 from my download manager using the easynews web interface the same time.What happened?I tried to create a ticket at help.easynews.com but got no response. I tried it via email to support on 10/30/2021 - now answer until now. So I try it this way.

It's difficult to find complet music albums as all are filed as single tracks.Very time consuming and frustrating to compile an album.Other platforms have complete albums - don't understand why you can't do it.Otherwise I would give 4 stars.
Recently i purchased 30 extra days because I exceeded my limits ( in the 18 + years I have been a member it never happened before), but only got something like 12 extra days!This happened twice
I am using an unlimited plan but my retention is too low when web browsing groups. Also newsgroup count is too low comparing 10 years ago... getting worse every year...
Easynews is fine, but nntp has gone downhill pretty significantly these last few years. Even decent nntp providers like Easynews can't fix this challenge.

Review.Titre: Both magazines and ebooks have been…
Review.Contenu: Both magazines and ebooks have been taken over with page after page of crap that I don't even know what it is!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Used to be really good, but has gone downhill.  When Highwinds took over, support got really poor, and nice touches like a little bonus at Christmas disappeared.  Development took a turn for the worse as the new search facilities are nowhere nearly as useful and although the old ones are still available, they only cover more recent postings.  Completeness of posts is good, but a number of newsgroups seem to have disappeared.  Speeds are mostly good, but this just shows up another aspect that isn't so great, the download limits on the web service.  Given the Internet speeds available these days, using up an entire month's allocation in about an hour is insane!  While larger allocations can be purchased, it starts to get too expensive.  Unlimited NNTP access is available, but the only reason to prefer Easynews is the web interface and search.  I will be changing to another service as soon as I can find one meeting my requirements.
Clunky often frustrating site operation.I miss the old days of Global 5 search, don't like the current interface.

Review.Titre: Easynews does not seem to allow…
Review.Contenu: Easynews does not seem to allow posting, and two attempts at contacting them about this went unanswered.
Okay product. VERY bad support - No answer on tickets/support.When my purchased period runs out - I'm out!

Review.Titre: The mobile app needs some work
Review.Contenu: The mobile app needs some work, can't turn safe mode off.
Its not very useful compared to NZB sites.

Review.Titre: Simplify the use of your site
Review.Contenu: I don't understant enough english to understand sufficiently your wriitings, so I try, I fai... coud you simplify your writings ?

Easynews was so easy to use. I enjoyed my time using the site. There are a couple of things which I found unhelpful these being : The amount of porn that would come up with searches. A young person could not be left unsupervised if searching for anything. The only other drawback was the number of irrelevant items that would also come with a search this sometimes made it very difficult to find anything.

Review.Titre: Useful, but time for an update.
Review.Contenu: It is very useful to have all postings searchable and easily downloadable, but Easynews finds too many postings, many off topic and many more than can be searched. If I am looking for postings in the past, computer updates will cause you to lose your place, causing you to start over. It also has problems going to specific pages.  The web site needs to be upgraded, as it has been the same for the approximately 8 years that I have been a member.

Review.Titre: Top speed, less and less content.
Review.Contenu: I am an Easynews client for about 15 years!Service and speed are still top notch. But the eh.. availability of the content I'm looking for, is decreasing rapidly. Looks like newsgroups are getting less and less recent content.So it's getting to a point where I'll start wondering if the money is still worth it.
Having difficulty recently accessing the platform - getting a lot of time out issues, and very slow response. Although, my ISP is working fine...otherwise, the solution is useful to me. thanks

Review.Titre: Sometimes Your site is very slow
Review.Contenu: Sometimes Your site is very slow. In autumn 2021 I had trouble to find anything in version 2. I had to find The Groups in the Vintage section. Now it is working again, but all groups are still not uppdated.

Review.Titre: Good price but I had missing articles
Review.Contenu: Good price but I had missing articles. I needed a filler account to complete posts. Only recommended with a filler account.

Review.Titre: It seems to take a lot longer before…
Review.Contenu: It seems to take a lot longer before movies are available to download compared to the way it was a few years back
I don't know why, but I find it harder to find what I'm looking for now when using the searchfunction.
Good have never had any problems with this site but to much virus in some groups

Review.Titre: that there is so much garbage nowadays…
Review.Contenu: that there is so much garbage nowadays even though I know that is not your fault but thats the way it goes
User manual?Best way to avoid including porn in searchesbest way to search on multi word searches and not include the single word searches.
Lost too many news groups, especially many of the alt.binaries. can no longer find many of the files I would want.

Review.Titre: I am unhappy with your new censorship…
Review.Contenu: I am unhappy with your new censorship policies

Review.Titre: Doesn't have everything I'm looking for.
cannot find par view on audio books

Review.Contenu: Used to be excellent. But quality has gone down in the last 5 years. Have been a loyal customer for over 15 years, but will probably switch soon.Examples:- Download links no longer work with most download managers, e.g. FDM, FlashGet.- GlobalSearch5 results are inconsistent, where results missing in a next search with same criteria, usually need to open a new page.

Review.Titre: When it works it's great.  But parts are broken on a regular basis.
Review.Contenu: When it works, it's great (5 stars).  But parts are broken on a regular basis (1 star), for days to weeks, due to live, untested roll-outs.  And there's just no meaningful way to get ahold of support.  There used to be live forums, but now there's a semi-obsolete FAQ with a link to a broken web form for support.

Review.Titre: Easynews's changes make it more difficult to use
Review.Contenu: Easynews has recently changed the Preferences choices making it more difficult for me to access larger postings (those of more than 100 photos). Also I continue to use the "Vintage" features because the newer versions are more difficult to navigate and several of the features do not work. Also the newer versions have fewer options thus if you do not prefer what they have as default then you are virtually SOL.I get more error messages than I use to but that may be more a factor of the internet than EN.

I cannot log in, I can't even email support to fix it. the button on the website doesn't work. This is nothing but a scam and I will be pursuing fraud action ASAP. Do not USE this SIte.  Old Review --- updatedI was contacted by support and they refunded my money. I appreciate the understanding they offered.The UX and UI need work but the company has made amends and I thank them for that.-- Updated

Review.Titre: Service works well most of the time
Review.Contenu: Service works well most of the time.  Wide range of newsgroups.  For as long as they have been around one would think they could develop an interface that is really useful (like be able to search a newsgroup specifically by date).  Anyways, decent service, good price.

Review.Titre: The amount of locked and virused files…
Review.Contenu: The amount of locked and virused files has risen to a level where it is getting very dicey downloading files from Easynews, Also the amount of German files in traditionally English groups has become a pain in the ass , could we not mark groups specifically to country.

Review.Titre: Came back to give the service a try…
Review.Contenu: Came back to give the service a try again.  Was a previous customer for 5+ years.  Had great service with no complaints.  Cannot say this for this time around.  Service is more difficult to use.  Tried to change setting for the original interface.  Cannot get the change to take effect.  Tried customer support, not much luck here.

Review.Titre: Excellent search capabilities negated by insufficient hardware infrastructure
Review.Contenu: Because of its search capabilities, Easynews™ has been my favorite Usenet service for many years.  Unfortunately, as of the last few months, I have repeatedly encountered 'Servers under load; please try again later' messages, which virtually negates that feature.

Review.Titre: Signed a trial account and got charged…
Review.Contenu: Signed a trial account and got charged with 90USD. Service is not responding.Next step is to contact paypal. Username:*****Please refund the money.Edit: easyusenet made a refund. In my eyes fair- i changed the valuation to 3 stars.

Review.Titre: Most times when I download the zipped…
Review.Contenu: Most times when I download the zipped files from Zipmanager there are lots of checksum errors when I try to unzip the files. However, I can download the file directly without it being zipped and it comes out just fine.

Review.Titre: It’s but sheets the easiest to search
Review.Contenu: It’s but sheets the easiest to search.  It with be nice if there was info on “how” to search for specific files.  Also there have been times where a file in a series was removed breaking the chain (par files).

Review.Titre: I liked the service for the first year…
Review.Contenu: I liked the service for the first year I had it. Then my credit card was charged for a second year automatically. I don't remember signing up for an auto renew subscription, s;'o I wasn't particularly happy about that, It also seems the server is having more problems than it used to, inordinately delaying my requests for downloads (but the download speed is pretty good, once you get it to start). Finally, I can't understand why the admins don't delete news items that contain viruses instead of just flagging that fact that they have viruses. All in all, it's a pretty good service, but I don't know anything about its competitors.

Review.Titre: I've been subscribing to Easynews since…
Review.Contenu: I've been subscribing to Easynews since the late '90s. Over the years I've grown frustrated with accessibility and diminishing content.I am debating to continue my subscription

Review.Titre: Been with for 10 years, was better at the start.
Review.Contenu: When I started their retention was a year. I have upgraded my plan and I now only have a few months of searchable retention. You can never call someone, it’s always hours if not days for response.
too many aggregated posts, aka binaries, get cancelled immediately aftergetting posted, while the articles they consist of are still available.

Review.Titre: I am not found of the UI
Review.Contenu: I am not found of the UI, it is partly clumsy

Review.Titre: Didnt have a lot of the files I was…
Review.Contenu: Didnt have a lot of the files I was looking for. The sure is put together well though. Easy to search and download.

Review.Titre: Stuck paying every month even though I…
Review.Contenu: Stuck paying every month even though I have, and paid for, more gigs than I'll ever use.
Works well. Retention not great. Less content than before. Prices are a bit high.

Review.Titre: slow and heavy downloads every time I…
Review.Contenu: slow and heavy downloads every time I want to start downloads..no matter the day
dont max my gigs at 750. ive been with you for over 17 years.

Review.Titre: Too many hidden thumbnails and files…
Review.Contenu: Too many hidden thumbnails and files with all filters off.

Review.Titre: Love the movies but the crossdressers…
Review.Contenu: Love the movies but the crossdressers have got to GO!!
Very expensive, but service is good.
xxxxxxxxxx

Review.Titre: Overall the service is good however…
Review.Contenu: Overall the service is good however tech support leaves a lot to be desired

Review.Titre: I use the site daily & have been…
Review.Contenu: I use the site daily & have been satisfied for many years.

The Good:the great diversity in the movies available, although it can never be enough.The Bad:Some of the downloads stutter and or pixelate. I delete the download and try again. If it fails again, I give up. Am I charged for the the unacceptable downloads? It might be good business to permit your users to have the privilege to have a live person available rather than the usual "Contact us by email.

Review.Titre: We have experienced low speed problems…
Review.Contenu: We have experienced low speed problems since we moved house in November 2022.I have talked to our fibre supplier several times and his spec and my actual are no where near each otherI like your service and have used for many years, its a shame there is not fadter ports to NZCheers

Review.Titre: I've been using Easynews for decades…
Review.Contenu: I've been using Easynews for decades now.  I can almost always find what I'm looking for there!  I don't fully understand all of the features, or why some results are "hidden", but I'm happy with the service.

Review.Titre: STABLE, RELIABLE, and yet, in need of Enhancements
Review.Contenu: The interface has been stable and reliable.  New features and support content for the novices would be extremely helpful,  Use cases:  PUBLISH COMMUNITY SUPPORT: how can I publish content?  what are the steps, pros and cons, protocols, etiquette, best practices?  How to publish anonymously?  how to respond to posters, how to create a group to publish to, how to rate groups/content. SEARCH SUPPORT:  how to find things across ALL newsgroups (in favorites groups and not), how to filter effectively (with wildcards and negative (exclusion) criterion), how to filter by language, file type (with popular/free/best  tools for viewing, editing these file types), how to decipher files (.NFO, etc.) I would love to use this tool more but find that there is not enough valid, current support to provide and access content SPECIFIC to Easynews.

Review.Titre: Easynews is one of the best newsgroup…
Review.Contenu: Easynews is one of the best newsgroup sites available. The content goes back 10 years in some newsgroups and the web base interface makes it extremely easy without needing another third party tool to view the content.It loses a 5 of of 5 rating from me, as it has too many separated interfaces to need to do everything. The billing and account is it's own module, the "original" web interface has much more functionality than the current interface, and although it is 10 years data, there is a lot of lost content the further back you go.

I use easynews for almost 18 years now, the prices didn't rise, the download speed has always been sufficient. I can't remember having problems with the availability of easynews. The now offerd VPN access is agreat add on.Keep up the good work.

Been with Easynews since 2004.  Haven't changed their search engine all that much in that time.  After 17 years you would have thought the web designers would have added more features in particular searching for only your preferred language.  One and only pet peeves of mine.On the plus side their team are really good at assisting you with any issue you are faced with.  Well in my case at least they have!Their material is stored for a really long time so seeking out TV episodes and movies from 10 yrs ago normally returns what I'm looking for.Wouldn't have stayed so long with them if they were rubbish!!  :}

Review.Titre: In most respects EN has been wonderful
Review.Contenu: In most respects EN has been wonderful.  The website is easy to use and clear and comprehensive.  I love it and visit regularly.  The negative is the EN support and sometimes be awful!  They can be rude unhelpful and hostile.  I rarely need to use Support and when I do need to I hesitate not knowing what kind of response I will get.  Because EN is run so efficiently, I rarely need to use Support.  I do not think I have needed support in the last 2 or more years.  I am a sports fan and a way EN could improve is to have more up to date Sports posts.  Thank you EN for all the good work you do over the many years I have subscribed to your serviced!
The classic search UI is just so much clearer and complete. But I cannot search and sort using multiple criteria. eg by Size and by Date. Doesn’t seem like a difficult thing to implement?

Review.Titre: May I suggest that there be an option…
Review.Contenu: May I suggest that there be an option to return to a specific date when opening a folder.  Periodically I must reload EASYNEWS at which time I must spend time scrolling through the various date folders to return to where I was. . Thank you

I personally would like to have a detailed tutorial which would explain how to take full advantage of the various functions of Easynews. The user info currently available appears to be pretty basic. Other than that no major complaints. ;-)
I have been using EasyNews for about 20 years. It has always met my expectations even if at times, some shortcomings (broken links or retention issues)

Review.Titre: Been an Easynews customer for over 20 years…
Review.Contenu: Been an Easynews customer for over 20 years. You don’t stick with a company for that long unless they’re worth it. They are. I actually worked for the company that owns Easynews for a couple of years ~10+ years ago. They were a good company and they did a great job with their platform. The only reason I give 4 instead of 5 stars is that sometimes Easynews support can come off as…adversarial. To be fair, I’ve only ever had to contact them 2 or 3 times…ever. And to be even more fair, it has been YEARS since I’ve had to request support. But the times I did, there was always at least a little bit of struggle and pushback. But, the fact that I’ve only needed to use them 2/3 times in probably 22+/- years is a testament to how well they do their jobs on the back end. Highly recommended!

Good service, exceept the navigation system, not easy and sometimes technical problem, (white page) ...It could be great to have a calendar style view to show how many posts and to go directly to a precise date.
In general, very good! However, customer service turns very quickly to the 'copyright issue' when user asks for help with technical issues - that is annoying!

Been a member with Easynews for like 20 yearsThey are pretty good obviously!I will say that content searching is not what it used to be, compared to when I first joined I could find anything and everything.Good download speeds though
The service is expensive compared to others it is kind and the search can be erattic.  But it's easy to use with great retention.
Overall, I am quite satisfied with the content and easy friendly search.
Simple and quick newsreader. With a few pauses I have used this newsreader for many, many years and always been very satisfied with the performance.

Review.Titre: Usually great access to files, but lately too many RAR files need a password.
Review.Contenu: Usually good variety and good access to files.  However, there are more and more files that are RAR  or Z that need passwords.  That is annoying.
well worth the investment. Get access to loads of new movies and the web-based thumbnails makes it easy to find what you are looking for. They have content dating back over 12 years
A stable service, but the price could be better if you compare it with otter services.

Review.Titre: The nzb indexer is very slow and…
Review.Contenu: The nzb indexer is very slow and sometimes not successful. I love the search engine. It’s very powerful.
I typically find what I am looking for quickly and the range of material is vast
Are use it for KodiLes plug-ins are including easynews and the price can go  down

Review.Titre: I gave 4 stars only becuse some movies…
Review.Contenu: I gave 4 stars only becuse some movies are very hard to find  other wise i would have give 5 stars
Through the years (more than 5) Easynews has performed a stable service. Only a very few hickups.
It would be useful to have a click on preview page of formats available
A good service. I don't know if it's my age, but I find the old style interface easier to use.

Review.Titre: still very good for the price
Review.Contenu: It has fallen off a little bit.But I have been with it for so long.Your search vehicle which I use isnot as thorough as before.
The web search is great. The price is good if you can get a desk on unlimited downloads.
Good, Interface could be more design but everything works fine.

Review.Titre: Preferred the old vpn to the one that…
Review.Contenu: Preferred the old vpn to the one that is included now. Was much easier to work with
Good speedGood reliabilityVery good rentention (begining 'plus' plan and upper)

Review.Titre: Things are great until you change…
Review.Contenu: Things are great until you change something.  When you do, bugs pop up.  Examples of past bugs: 404 in selecting queues or on unqueued trying to more to queued. select "next" queue entry did not work right; color changes on queue did not work correctly.  Most of the issues get fixed but it sometimes takes a while. Please test changes more thoroughly before you implement them

I've been using Easynews for over 20 years & am, overall, quite satisfied.  The retention is great, the search indexing usually gets me to what I want & the tech support has been quite good though I do miss calling an 800# & actually talking to someone.  Sometimes actions are slow to occur but that is to be expected & overall I would say the site functions well about 95% of the time.

Review.Titre: This had to do with setting up SABnzbd…
Review.Contenu: This had to do with setting up SABnzbd for use with Easynews:As complete as the instructions were there are too many areas where the user is left hanging. For instance, "Put [this data] for the email you received..." Well, what data from what email from whom??? And if I don't have that (I was on the road setting up my laptop, long after my desktop had been set up) where else can I find the value to fill in a field.

I've been a customer(big-gig) for a very long time.  For the most part I'm very satisfied.  The only thing I have a problem with is that lately I often find files posted in formats I don't understand & like yenc & par files.  I've tried to learn about these, downloaded par viewers, etc. to no avail.  I just can't figure out how to use them  (my problem, I know).  Absent that I'm pretty satisfied.

I've been on Easynews for almost 20 years.  The site uptime is reliable, retention is good and the browser-based search is easy to use.  I would give them 5 stars if the aforementioned searches were more consistent - one version can't find an article, but another version can.  Sometimes the filters get reset to defaults when you go back in the browser.The support page has a lot of dead/404 links.Fixing these will take the rating up a notch.
Generally excellent but not fully abreast with the most recent material.

Review.Titre: Easynews is heads above other providers in USNET.
Review.Contenu: Easynews is a service that makes things easy for the USNET market customer.They also are very dependable as far as uptime. Dependable and reasonable are the first two adjectives that spring to my mind. They also have an excellent support system to get help where so many companies these days think they can do it all by a Robot. Kinda hard when the computer is giving you the problem. Would love to see the Telephone support line installed as they used to have, but the email team is very good.

Review.Titre: Same problems as with other news servers…
Review.Contenu: Same problems as with most other news servers DMCA causing far too limited retention times forcing greater reliance on non-usenet sources.  This has had big impact on easynews web service which I haven't accessed at all in '21 & v. little in '20. NNTP speeds are generally good with few periods of downtime.  It is difficult to see usenet use beyond us diehards especially with increasing costs Vs falling real world retention.

Review.Titre: I've been with Easynews more than 15…
Review.Contenu: I've been with Easynews more than 15 years and so far, It is still awesome. Price is now on a yearly basis and you can find anything there. Downloads speeds will max your internet connection. Only part it could improve is related to the latest VR content but I wouldn't be surprise that they are coming on it.

I think the deal I'm on is a fair price, 90% of the time I have had no issues with downloading content (when files are found in search). Would give 5 stars but have been unable to find a few files, unsure if this is a retention issue, search/naming issue or just obscure files that aren't present.

Review.Titre: It is a quick and happy usenet provider.

Review.Contenu: As a first-time user of Easynews, this seems like a good service for accessing online media. Currently got the promotional price (which was an added incentive for joining). So far, my use of it has been limited and I haven't used it to its full capabilities. However, this will change in the near future.
Looks Ok.  Operate generally very good.

Review.Titre: Reliable and economical service to the…
Review.Contenu: Reliable and economical service to the Usenet. I've been using Easynews since the year 2000. The still offer and I prefer what they call "Vintage Easynews" which is a throwback to the early 2000's when photos were more prevalent than videos and everyone used "news reader" software. Recent customer service is poor compared to the earlier 2000's, but service rarely breaks.
Great service, good price. Simply didn’t use it as much as I thought I would.

Overall, much better than my previous provider. Gave it 4 instead of 5 stars because the online search tool seems a bit slow and clunky. It constantly defaults to searching for videos only, and the initial search is by 'relevance' where the ordering seems more random than by relevance, and I have to effectively repeat the search to order by date etc.These are minor complaints, overall the search is useful and the service is very fast and has complete posts going back many years.

I have been a happy Easynews customer for almost 20 years.  The Usenet service is very reliable and Global Search is an excellent feature that sets it apart from other providers.  I deducted 1 star as they could be more transparent when their are system problems.  The support site rarely reports when their decoder has a backlog.

I’ve always found Easynews useful and easy to navigate. I do still tend to prefer the classic indexes. I wish that they had kept the support message board public. I also don’t understand why all dates of files show up as zero. Other than that, it’s great.

Generally a good experience. Interface is easy to navigate. Retention is excellent. However, there are many times that posts are not available. The header shows but the post is empty. I am a member of multiple usenet services so I can see if the post is available on another reader. Otherwise I have no complaints.

Review.Titre: Good Interface and Overall Service but Some Concerns
Review.Contenu: Overall, the Easiness service is very good, and the web interface works very well, but I have a few concerns:1. Support is slow, and I rarely receive a satisfactory answer. I have a very high level of technical skills. If I contact support, it is because of an issue that cannot be resolved easily, and I should not receive a scripted answer.2. There have been service outages with no website updates or other notification to customers.3. Easynews rarely notifies members of issues or updates. Their support forum has been closed for years, as has their blog. I maybe receive one email per year from them.

Review.Titre: I really like your site but my one…
Review.Contenu: I really like your site but my one complaint is having to sort through the porn to find what I want. I adjusted the settings to try to eliminate the porn but then I got almost zero results for my searches. I could live with the porn search results if the thumbnails could be eliminated.

Your service is fantastic, especially for someone new to usenet. The interface is well designed for the most part. Some of the functionality was not obvious immediately and there are occasional UI bugs. Overall I'm very satisfied.

I find easynews.com a good quality and dependable source for downloads. My speed is consistently good and the site is reliably online. I will continue my membership as i am happy with the service and my value for my dollar...

Review.Titre: I would give a 5  but for support
Review.Contenu: I would give a 5  but for the customer service. Numerous times I have sent email to support and received no replies. Not good.Otherwise an excellent service with little to no down time, fast downloads Easy searching.

You can have 5 star rating, but you remove the nice feature in the zip manager / unqueue  of x number of entries par page, forcing us  tio deal with a small 100 items per pages.What you remove so appreciate features?

Review.Titre: Everything is good execpt just one…
Review.Contenu: Everything is good execpt just one thing. There is a lot of video that are titled in english but they are in German. The german do not always identify thgerman vidoe as being in german. But the rest is great.

Review.Titre: Pricing is amazing for what you get
Review.Contenu: Pricing is amazing for what you get. However, lots of connection drops/timeouts, random slow downloads. Small issues like double period getting added to files in the zip queue that take forever to get addressed.
Fine but remarks about availabilitySpeed is Ok, i am not that hasty. But sometimes files are not downloadable while present in the list. This is annoying. Especially when part of a bigger zip file.

Review.Titre: The system works well on easynews
Review.Contenu: The system works well on easynews. Content is getting so bad when it comes to attachments. Nothing like it used to be. I dont find many things as I would like but this is how times are I guess.
Easynews lives up to its name in being very user friendly. Content seems to get taken off very quickly although its available elsewhere on usenet. I would still definitely   recommend Easynews.
There are some things I'm not able to find, and sometimes the resolution quality  of what's there isn't the best, but overall I'm very happy with the selection and the price.

Review.Titre: NNTP always works great as always but…
Review.Contenu: NNTP always works great as always but web side can have problems, global5 missing date/time since Search3 arrived, 404's on files despite thumbnails working and nzb creation can hit and miss (missing files again)

Review.Titre: I used to be able to have 1000 items…
Review.Contenu: I used to be able to have 1000 items per page. There is no preference button to change from 100 items to 1000. Also the email page doesn't work. When you hit submit it does nothing.
Works very well, normally very good connection and download speeds especially with download manager! Rates are good with good download allowance that gets rolled over if not used!

Review.Titre: Overall Easynews is great to work with…
Review.Contenu: Overall Easynews is great to work with and a valuable resource tool.My only complaint is sometimes the search function is a little quirky and it makes quality results difficult

Review.Titre: Good retention. Search needs an update
Review.Contenu: The web search really needs an update

Review.Titre: I have been satisfied with Easynews
Review.Contenu: I have been satisfied with Easynews. They have good, reliable connections, and are priced fair. I have had usenet service that are 5 times their price, and slow as snails!

Review.Titre: Overall great experience, bandwidth could be a bit better
Review.Contenu: Retention, Web Interface and Support deserve a full 5 Star Rating. I am taking one star off for the limitation of bandwidth to 30 MByte/s, which appears slightly outdated in 2021.
EasyNews is a great service, The only reason I did not give 5 stars is because the completion rate seems to have gone down somewhat drastically over the past 6 months.

Review.Titre: I would like to be able to upload or…
Review.Contenu: I would like to be able to upload or post a message to a newsgroup on occasion from the Easynews webpage. This happens when I am on my tablet for example.
Great service.

Review.Titre: Except for Kodi 19 hiccup with  I…
Review.Contenu: Except for Kodi 19 hiccup, I enjoyed using the service. It's reliable and very easy to use. This was resolved quite quickly, so I all good now.
Great search functionality, but it happens frequently that attachments or parts of the search result are no longer available - no matter how old they are.
Great job, keep on making it happening for the people who can't aford Cable, plus we get tired of seeing the same thing for 30 days or more.

Review.Titre: I’ve been using easynews since the…
Review.Contenu: I’ve been using easynews since the beginning. Always been a great experience.I would like to see an app based version for iPad,phones etc.
I  like to read audio-books. There are many translated to German without saying that they are German.  This becomes somewhat confusing.

Review.Titre: There is always room for improvement
Review.Contenu: There is always room for improvement. There is still quite a bit of virus threats that slip thru. Identify the uploaders and ban them.

Review.Titre: A bit confusing with EasyNews vs NHXL…
Review.Contenu: A bit confusing with EasyNews vs NHXL Newshosting.Even more confusing with the web app for newsgroups, I ended up going back to using Forte Agebt,
Site works well although communication is not the best. I was not able to access for awhile and tried emailing with no response

Review.Titre: Seems like there is less content than in the past
Review.Contenu: Seems like there is less content than in previous years, but it is still quite good. Transfer speeds are usually excellent.
Audio search is difficult. Grouping by album appears to be impossible so if you want an album you have to piece it together
There were a couple of times this year when service was a bit spotty, but otherwise I couldn't ask for anything more.
I would have given 5 stars, but, I had to explain the issue 4 times before techs would look beyond what they were seeing
Great job! there is just one thing, sometimes access to server may be long. Otherwise, the overall experience is great!

Review.Titre: I find EasyNews great in most areas
Review.Contenu: I find EasyNews great in most areas.  The only critism I have is with occaisional backlogs that seem to last for a week or more.
Most of the time great, very fast. Occasionally ZipManager returns an error message when download attempted.

Review.Titre: Would be nice to have a cleaner…
Review.Contenu: Would be nice to have a cleaner interface for search a bit more compatible for tablets and phones.
Great I enjoy using it. I really love the web based features. Wish it had more of what I'm looking for.
When it's working it's great.Way too little information when it's not working.All in all OK.
The interface is intutive and reasonably user-friendly and the newsgroup selection is awesome
Awesome site, lots of content, would like to have a language button to choose what shows
Super easy to search and find the stuff you're interested in. You can easily review the files before opening and they're updating all the news constently.
Was recommended this by a friend.   The search interface is easy to use and it’s also very easy to configure all of the tools that one might associate with such a service.
A bit expensive but, it is worth it.  Best service out there. Fast download speeds, great web ui.
As old Tina used to sing, "Simply the best, better than all UseNets"
Great Speed Great Redundancy Great pricing

Review.Titre: Always has what I’m looking for
This is the best Usenet provider
Review.Contenu: I have tried many Usenet servers & I've finally ended up with Easynews provider. Upon purchase, you'll receive just one NNTP server & it was blazing fast. So, no more multiple servers are needed after that. I'm getting full speed with 99% article availability. You can try this, and I'm sure you won't regret using Easynews. It is the happiest investment I've ever made this year.PS: I've never contacted customer support. Because I didn't get any issues so far, but I'm pretty sure their support is very responsive.

Easynews provides reliable access and fast downloads for a reasonable price. I have used them for more than a decade with very few. Somethings appear with no explanations or access such as hidden thumbnails. But overall few problems.

Are you kidding? I've been a member for like 15 years or more. Kept paying every month and upgraded a while ago. Of course I'm satisfied. I download a lot of video content and am grateful that often a favoured TV show or movie is uploaded same day or next day after release.

Review.Titre: Easy to find what I am looking for.

Review.Contenu: Easynews is fantastic! You are able to download pictures, audio files, video, and more. For a monthly fee, you have access to thousands of items which can be easily downloaded with the click of a mouse. Search for what you want and, it is listed. Sorting the list is easy. I've been using this app for several years and I can thoroughly recommend it.

Brilliant dual-interface concept. NNTP interface for traditional Usenet clients, web interface with a few additional features for use with web browsers and browser-like clients. What makes it more brilliant is both interfaces are simple, fast, responsive. Web interface also works great on phones. It's the best Usenet service I've ever seen. I signed up with Easynews in 2002 or 2003 or something (can't remember the exact year, and Easynews doesn't send me any annoying reminders to make sure I know).

This company provides a great usenet service, with beautifully fast download speeds that should max out almost any Internet connection out there. Files should download nice and quick, just the way it should be.

I've been happily using easynews since the 2000's, its a great way to get usenet binaries pre-assembled with fantastic connectivity/speed.The 3rd party VPN service they bundle is OK with decent bandwidth exit nodes and easy Wireguard/OpenVpn setup or an app if you like doing it that way. I use it regularly (mostly to watch video when on the road) but its hard to tell if its trustworthy/nolog and what the parentage of the company is (who are the actual exit nodes they are reselling), which is worrisome. The IP's tend to not get blocked too often, but google shunts them into a forced captcha to do basic/anonymous searches most of the time so they are being marked somewhere.

Review.Titre: I’ve been an easy news customer for…
Review.Contenu: I’ve been an easy news customer for almost twenty years. The ease of the old style search engine (I don’t care for the new version) makes easy news simple to use. I especially appreciate that easy news left the old search engine in place instead of forcing customers to switch like so many developers do.

Easynews unpacks rars so you can pick small elements out of large posts. Another great feature is the virus scan and the preview. And Easynews is FAST. Now the retention is longer too - you don't need anything else for usenet.

I don’t subscribe to any of the premium cable offers .. HBO, Showtime, Cinemax but I get all the latest movies that these cable stations offer many times before cable even has them. Same for my music. I have access to download all the latest hits without having to pay anything extra. Very satisfied with my Easynews membership.

Review.Titre: Easy News Provides Good customer service and is an excellent usenet provider
Review.Contenu: Great Customer service, ensured that i could i receive the promotion even though there were technical difficulties from my old account.  they also provide a outstanding Usenet service. worth looking into if you have a need for Usenet services.

What I love about Easynews is It has become my go-to site when no other search engine has it at all. Keep an eye on your personal usage to make sure you don't get locked out until the next billing cycle. Otherwise couldn't be happier. Great Stuff?

Review.Titre: Your web application is great when it…
Review.Contenu: Your web application is great when it comes to search and the fact that you can just click on a PAR fil and get all files that's connected to that.

Review.Titre: EASYNEWS great usenet provider so EASY
Review.Contenu: EASYNEWS has been a great usenet service for me for over 23 year. long retention, fast web, nzb and web and client access fast download speeds. The search function not the easiest to use but works. Price is very good for all the functions  and access you get.,

Review.Titre: Great Usenet service without all the hassle
Review.Contenu: Great service. Global5 is a massive differentiator in finding stuff on usenet, and downloads are always super fast. Been a user for 15+ years, can't see that changing anytime soon.

Review.Titre: Highly Recommended - Easynews is simply simple!
Review.Contenu: As a long time user of Easynews, I can highly recommend it. I started out simply using the WEB interface, and after some years advanced up to NNTP. I could generally max out my internet link (in Australia) on NNTP, and with a little help from download accelerators, max out the WEB download also. Now that I am back in New Zealand where we have far superior internet, I cant max it out, but hey, 65Mb/s is pretty common :) (My link is 950/450). As an example, an ISO of around 4Gb takes just a little over 60 seconds to complete.

Review.Titre: I have been using Easynews since…
Review.Contenu: I have been using Easynews since February of 2005. It is secure, great quality of stuff and I have never had an issue with them.

Review.Titre: Easynews is the most reliable source…
Review.Contenu: Easynews is the most reliable source for movies, tv shows, etc. it’s the best. I’ve been using it for years. And I always recommend it for people with kodi home movie and entertainment experience.
Great service. Their beta search is very versatile, and download speeds are always fast. I've been using them for years. They're very reliable, and their support crew is very responsive.

Review.Titre: Always find what I'm looking for
Review.Contenu: Always find what I'm looking for! That's why I've been a member for 28 years. Still love vintage search option. Nice to have potential viruses identified.

Review.Titre: I've been an Easynews customer since…
Review.Contenu: I've been an Easynews customer since 2003 and while having retained my account all this time (because of the webinterface convenience), I've also tried other news providers. Where others have failed eventually, Easynews have consistently held up and have never let me down. For me, nothing has been able to beat Easynews. No incompletes, no bull, extremely little downtime, max speed (I consistently max out my 1Gbit/1Gbit connection).
It does what I want. The interface is laid out very well and whatever I'm searching for, generally. Is available.Excellent value.

Review.Titre: I have been happily using EasyNews for many years
Review.Contenu: I have been using EasyNews for many years to follow Usenet groups. It is the best and easiest Web-based Usenet service I have used. I love the Global search engine and use it often. Five star service!

Review.Titre: I've been a member since the 00s over 2…
Review.Contenu: I've been a member since the 00s over 2 accounts. Easynews has always offered a high quality service, great retention and a very innovate Web UI.Highly recommended.

Review.Titre: I have always had a great experience…
Review.Contenu: I have always had a great experience with Easynews. I do however occasionally have a problem with a zip collection of files not extracting once downloaded (individual files from same collection, download no problem). I still get the file so no problem.Keep up the good work.

Easynews is very easy to use, and as a search engine for downloads is second to none! I don’t fear getting viruses when I use Easynews, so feel completely safe in continuing to download. It has served me well over the past 5 years or so!

I have been using EasyNews for just shy of 20 years, and it has, without a doubt, been the best money I have ever spent. It has been an invaluable resource. I recommend it to all of my friends, without hesitation.

Review.Titre: Simple, Fast, Reliable - Been using them for 23 years
Review.Contenu: My review of Easynews is really simple, fast, reliable newsgroup access. I should know I have been a member for over 23 years.

BEST of Usenet services, I’ll used it about 10-12 years. Trying all like Giganews and ect… The best 10 of 10 of all:Speed Fullness Redemptionone “thing” sometimes they have service problems- like 1-2days per year Totally - the best, fastest & secure (it’s about VPN SERVICE)

Review.Titre: Been with easynews for over 22 years
Review.Contenu: Been with easynews for over 22 years. The connections are extremely fast & support mant simultaneous threads with download managers.Retention times are unsurpassed.You name it - Easynews has it.

Review.Titre: Learn how to use all that Easynews has to offer.
Review.Contenu: An outstanding website!  This site saves me sooooo much money with the content that it provides. Thanks Easynews!R,D. Williams
Ease of use, the large variety of files available: videos, audio, images.  Have been using Easynews for a number of years now.

Review.Titre: Been a paying member for 10yrs now.
Review.Contenu: Been a paying member for 10yrs now.. No complaints whatsoever. Super fast, reliable and there's nothing you can't find.

Review.Titre: You can find plenty of things
Review.Contenu: You can find plenty of things. Results of search are a bit esoteric for newbies, but I've been using this service for years and I'm very satisfied.

Have been an Easynews customer for a number of years and have never encountered any problems or issues at all - everything has worked as advertised, all of the time. Excellent connection speeds and a very useful web interface.

Review.Titre: I love watching old movies and there…
Review.Contenu: I love watching old movies and there are plenty of them on your web site.  Plus, thousands of other interesting things to download.  Thanks for posting them.Bob Baldwin
I've been using easynews for a long time. I love the service. Perhaps my only complain is they don't have an official mobile client for browsing.
Been a customer for years.  I like the user-friendly interface and the powerful search engine
I joined to download movies being shared on usenet and I have not been disappointed. Bluray versions are definitely the best.
I've been an easynews user for many years. The service has always been fantastic and continues to be so. I would always recommend easynews as the best Usenet portal.
Reliable. Most up to date site. Most variety of groups. I've been a member for many, many years and will continue to enjoy.
I am a totally satisfied customer since more than 17 years. The global search tool with it's interface is just perfect. Thank you!

Review.Titre: Have used these guys for 18yrs near on…
Review.Contenu: Have used these guys for 18yrs near on everyday - never ever an issue.. Rock solid performance and availability in everyway
Ez axcs. Go!

Review.Titre: Been with Eaysnews for many years now
Review.Contenu: Been with Eaysnews for many years now. Great service at a reasonable price. I am happy to be a member. I would recommend to subscribe to their service.

Review.Titre: I've had my Easynews account since 199...
Review.Contenu: I've had my Easynews account since the early 1990s.I'm not sure I can say anything more complimentary than that!
Great uptime. On the few occasions that you need it, tech support is very responsive.
A dependable usenet destination, with a vast quantity of information.  Never a problem with billing. Have been a member 23 years, with no intention to quit.

Review.Titre: Beeing a customer for many years
Review.Contenu: Beeing a customer for many years, there is still nothing to complain! And a lot to be excited about the good quality  of the service.
Long time customer.  Does what it does really well.  Will happily keep using.

Review.Contenu: Easynews has been a trustful companion of mine for over 15 years! I'm glad to have it and sure gonna stick to easynews😎
I've been a customer for more than 10 years straight, using the unlimited NNTP option. Very satisfied with Easynews' retention, speed, service availability, web search and web download.
A reliable newsgroup service I am using for several years now and like it very much.
This company is giving true news and use full informative
Reliable for the most part. Any possible glitches are usually resolved promptly.

Review.Titre: Fantastic speed and easy to reach…
Review.Contenu: Fantastic speed and easy to reach content. One suggestion: group links together for related content like series.
It's easy, convenient and quick. We all enjoy the benefits of Easynews, almost every day.
Everything.User interface, bandwidth, search results, and privacy.Solid company and site.
For the past +10 years the service from Easynews has been running smooth. No hickups, no issues.

well guys, I am a customer since 2001, that should count for something (c:

highlights:browser operated,preview,no need to struggle with .rar and .par

good retention and easy to use web interface.
